Name: SPLIT BULLET
About the game: SPLIT BULLET is a game all about 'splitting up' a massive crowd of enemies—yes, those polygons—crawling towards you. Don't let 'em get you and survive as long as you can, by using your instincts and weapons. Features: Minimalistic game design Insane amount of enemies coming out from all sides Massive amount of bullets splitting around everywhere Various weapons to choose from, and multiple stages for you to tackle Test your limit in Endless Mode!
